common.howItWorksText: Buy a ticket, wait for the timer to end, and see if you won! Each draw is random and transparent.
common.rulesText: Players must be 18+. Tickets are final and non-refundable. Abuse is not tolerated.
common.technicalText: Bittery uses Chainlink VRF for randomness and runs entirely on smart contracts.
common.trustText: All draws and transactions happen on-chain, so anyone can verify the results.
common.codeText: Our code is public on GitHub for anyone to inspect.
common.termsIntro: By using the Bittery platform, you agree to the following terms and conditions:
common.termsBullet1: You must be at least 18 years old to participate.
common.termsBullet2: All bets are final. No refunds are allowed once a ticket is purchased.
common.termsBullet3: The lottery system is decentralized and uses Chainlink VRF for randomness.
common.termsBullet4: We do not guarantee earnings. This is a game of chance.
common.termsBullet5: Bittery reserves the right to pause or terminate the contract if abuse or exploits are detected.
common.termsBullet6: By connecting your wallet, you accept full responsibility for its usage and security.
common.termsBullet7: This dApp is experimental. Use at your own risk.
common.privacyIntro: At Bittery, we value your privacy. As a decentralized application (dApp), we do not collect personal information directly.
common.privacyBullet1: We do not store names, emails, or any personal identifiers.
common.privacyBullet2: We interact with your Ethereum wallet (e.g., MetaMask) to process transactions.
common.privacyBullet3: Wallet addresses and transaction history are publicly recorded on the blockchain.
common.privacyBullet4: Third-party services (e.g., Chainlink VRF, Alchemy, Cloudflare) may collect metadata such as IP addresses.
common.privacyBullet5: We may use anonymous analytics to improve site performance.
common.privacyConclusion: By using Bittery, you consent to this privacy policy. If you do not agree, please disconnect and refrain from using the application.
